parameters.name: DataQualityEvaluationTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the data quality monitoring task that is associated with the rule.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the rule. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 200.

parameters.name: TableGuid
parameters.description: The ID of the table that is limited by the rule in Data Map.
